title: 354: Say Nice Things to Bekah for Her Birthday!
itunes:title: 354: Say Nice Things to Bekah for Her Birthday!
description:
Broads, it’s Bekah’s birthday and she has some requests! They chat her 27th year, Y2K, the recent hauntings, Ruth’s birthday, Ember’s Elsa judgement, The Bros controversial Disneyland take, being high at California Adventure, Bekah demands Jess try something experimental and expensive for her birthday, Jess goes out again during her luteal phase, a freak out after a car accident, rude people, someone tells Bekah they are going to call the cops on her, Jess’ escalator fears, Bekah wants to be professor, how terrible they were as high schoolers, God bless the teachers, and more!

 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

GREENCHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY130 and use code CHATTY130 to get $130 off plus free shipping! 

NATIVE: Get 20% off plus your first order at NATIVEDEO.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY at checkout!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
